resources.string: Shows a QR code linking to essential info.
Choose or create a file first!

Open the QRitical Info app to
finish setting up this wallpaper.
No installed app can open this file!
The file you\'re sharing must be in your Google Drive.
No app on this device can edit plain text files!

This app needs access to your accounts and Drive so that it can obtain the sharing link for the file you\'re sharing. Limitations of the Google Drive API mean QRitical Info needs broader permissions in practice than in theory.
This file has the same name as a file in another folder of your Google Drive. Due to a limitation of the Google Drive API, you must use a file with a unique name.

QRitical Info lets you choose a file from your Google Drive and share it through a QR code on your lock screen. Use this for emergency contacts, but not for anything that would need to stay private if your device was stolen.
